price: 156. Ee ha ku taabannina wax xumaan (dhib) ah, yeysan idin qabane cadaab Maalin daran.
arabic: وَلَا تَمَسُّوهَا بِسُوٓءٖ فَيَأۡخُذَكُمۡ عَذَابُ يَوۡمٍ عَظِيمٖ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: walā tamassūhā bisūin fayakhudhakum ʿadhābu yawmin ʿaẓīmin
